title: Irving Park/Ravenswood - 1block to brown line
posting_body: Irving Park and Ravenswood - 1block to Brown line!
Rarely available bright and sunny 2 bedroom on a quiet and beautiful tree lined street of single family homes.
New from top to bottom!
New cabinets, stainless steel stove, refrigerator, dishwasher and wood laminated floor.
Living room - so sunny and bright with brand new plush wall to wall carpet, ceiling fans and mini blinds.
Bedrooms - new plush carpet, mini blinds, closets and ceiling fans.
Bathroom - all new tile, vanity, medicine cabinet and freshly refinished tub.
All the rooms have just been painted and are super clean!
3 closets and lots of in wall storage space with doors!
Window air conditioner comes with unit.
Long term tenants on the 2nd floor and owner on the 1st floor.
Very safe building.
Plenty of street parking available and free Cub night game parking passes.
It's like living on a suburban street in the heart of the city!
Get location!
Walking distance to Trader Joe's, Southport Corridor, Roscoe Village and Lincoln Square.
Electric, water and garbage is included in rent.
No yard and no laundry.
* I am practicing social distancing and request anyone coming to see the apartment wear a mask for the viewing.
I will also be masked up.
Thank you.
1 months security deposit.
Tenant pays gas and internet/cable.
